question: Will the Ethereum Merge (EIP-3675) occur by November 1, 2022?
description:
This is a market on if The Merge will occur on the Ethereum mainnet as described in EIP-3675 (or any successor to EIP-3675) by the resolution time, November 1, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, transitioning the Ethereum blockchain to proof-of-stake.

If the first proof-of-stake block (defined in EIP-3675 as TRANSITION_BLOCK) is produced before the resolution time, this market will resolve to "Yes". 
Otherwise, the market will resolve "No".

Note, that forks to the execution layer and the consensus layer implementing EIP-3675 will not have any impact on the market resolution. Only the actual occurrence of The Merge will be considered.

events.title: When will Ethereum Merge to Proof-of-Stake?
events.description:
This is a market group on when "The Merge" will occur on the Ethereum mainnet as described in EIP-3675 (or any successor to EIP-3675), transitioning the Ethereum blockchain to proof-of-stake.

Note that forks to the execution layer and the consensus layer implementing EIP-3675 will not have any impact on the market resolution. Only the actual occurrence of The Merge will be considered.

question: Will $ETH hit 3 digits (sub $1000) by June 30?
description:
This is a market on whether Ethereum ($ETH) will reach a price of $999.99 or less between June 13, 2022, 9 AM ET, and July 1, 2022, 12 AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if $ETH drops below $1000.00 USD within this market's timeframe. This market will resolve to "No" if the price of $ETH remains at $1000.00 or above for the entirety of this market's timeframe.

The primary resolution source for this market will be CoinGecko's 30min candlestick low prices, with "Fri Jul 01 2022, 00:00:00" as the last relevant candle used for the market. The resolution source can be found here: https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum. Note, this 00:00:00 candle lists the opening price at 11:30:00 PM ET and the closing price at 12:00:00 AM ET.

question: Will Bitcoin ($BTC) hit $20,000 or less by June 30?
description:
This is a market on whether Bitcoin ($BTC) will reach the price of $20,000.00 or less between June 13, 2022, 9 AM ET, and July 1, 2022, 12 AM ET.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Bitcoin ($BTC) drops to $20,000.00 or less within this market's timeframe. This market will resolve to "No" if the price of Bitcoin ($BTC) remains above $20,000.00 for the entirety of this market's timeframe.

The primary resolution source for this market will be CoinGecko's 30min candlestick low prices, with "Fri Jul 01 2022, 00:00:00" as the last relevant candle used for the market. The resolution source can be found here: https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/bitcoin. Note, the 00:00:00 candle lists the opening price at 11:30:00 PM ET and the closing price at 12:00:00 AM ET.

question: 2022 NBA Finals: Will the Celtics get more points than the Warriors in the 3rd quarter of Game 5?
description:
The 2022 NBA Finals is the championship series of the National Basketball Association (NBA)'s 2021–22 season and the conclusion of the season's playoffs. The finals follow a tournament format in a best-of-seven series. This season the finals are to be played between the Eastern Conference champions, the Boston Celtics, and the Western Conference champions, the Golden State Warriors.

This is a market on whether the Boston Celtics or the Golden State Warriors will score more points in 3rd quarter of Game 5 of the 2022 NBA Finals, a matchup scheduled for June 13, 2022 (9 PM ET).

This market will resolve to “Celtics” if the Boston Celtics score more points in the 3rd quarter of game 5 of the 2022 NBA Finals. This market will resolve to "Warriors" if the Golden State Warriors score more points in the 3rd quarter of game 5 of the 2022 NBA Finals. If the Golden State Warriors and the Boston Celtics score the same number of points in the 3rd quarter of Game 5 of the NBA Finals, this market will resolve 50-50.

If for any reason the game is not decided by June 30, 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET), this market will resolve 50-50.
groupItemTitle: Game 5: Who will score more points in 3rd quarter, Warriors or Celtics?

events.title: 2022 NBA Finals
events.description:
The 2022 NBA Finals is the championship series of the National Basketball Association (NBA)'s 2021–22 season and the conclusion of the season's playoffs. The finals follow a tournament format in a best-of-seven series. 

This season, the finals are played between the Eastern Conference champions, the Boston Celtics and the Western Conference champions, the Golden State Warriors.

question: Will Celsius Network resume withdrawals by July 13?
description:
The Celsius Network (celsius.network) is one of the largest cryptocurrency lending platforms in the market, and is estimated to have 1.7 million customers. On Sunday, June 12, 2022, the Celsius Network announced that it is suspending all withdrawals, Swaps, and transfers between accounts indefinitely "due to extreme market conditions". You can find "A Memo to the Celsius Community" which details the extent of their actions and their reasoning here: https://blog.celsius.network/a-memo-to-the-celsius-community-59532a06ecc6

This market will resolve to "Yes" if between June 13 and July 13, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET (inclusive), Celsius users are able to perform token withdrawals. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Any limits on withdrawals (e.g. maximum of X value of tokens in a specified period of time) will have no bearing on the resolution of this market. If any withdrawals are allowed by users, it will be sufficient to resolve this market to "Yes".

The primary resolution source for this market will be information released by the Celsius Network's official or verified channels (https://celsius.network/, https://twitter.com/celsiusnetwork, https://blog.celsius.network/, https://www.instagram.com/celsiusnetwork/, etc.), or a verified withdrawal by a Celsius user; however a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will Celsius announce bankruptcy by July 13?
description:
In Response to Trader Inquiry: If any subsidiary or parent of Celsius Network LLC announces bankruptcy by the resolution date, it will suffice to resolve this market to "Yes".

On Sunday, June 12, 2022, the Celsius Network (celsius.network) announced that it is suspending all withdrawals, Swaps, and transfers between accounts indefinitely "due to extreme market conditions". Celsius is one of the largest cryptocurrency platforms in the market, and is estimated to have 1.7 million customers.

You can find "A Memo to the Celsius Community" which details the extent of their actions and their reasoning here: https://blog.celsius.network/a-memo-to-the-celsius-community-59532a06ecc6

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Celsius Lending LLC announces that it will declare bankruptcy, is declaring bankruptcy, or has declared bankruptcy of any variety by July 13, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For a positive resolution to this market to occur, Celsius need only announce that they will declare bankruptcy, are declaring bankruptcy, or have declared bankruptcy by the resolution date, regardless of whether bankruptcy is actually declared at any time.

An "announcement by Celsius" must be made through any of their official or verified channels (https://celsius.network/, https://twitter.com/celsiusnetwork, https://blog.celsius.network/, https://www.instagram.com/celsiusnetwork/, etc.), as a recorded or written statement by their CEO, legal representation, or other individual or team which officially represents Celsius Lending LLC. A consensus of credible reporting may also be used to determine whether Celsius has issued such an announcement.
